tool_description: This API shows climate change news all over the world
title: climate-change-live-api

api_list.name: Get individual publication's news about climate change
api_list.description: Get individual publication's news about climate change all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-api5.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: Get climate change news all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-api5.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
